formEndpoint.description: The HTTP URL of the form that the user should send a POST request to.

form.description: The form to be displayed when requesting the service. If omitted, a form does not need to be displayed.

requestId.description: The request id that the user should send to the form endpoint and send to the blockchain. Uint256.

cost.description: The cost of the service in ABA. Uint256.

expiry.description: The minimum time in block numbers for the service request to be completed
